backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor that stores acceptance records with timestamps and optional notes, and exposes queries for latest record and total count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component toggling between the proposal screen and the success celebration based on acceptance state.
frontend/src/components/proposal/HeartsC: Component generating animated floating heart confetti using inline keyframes and randomized heart properties.
frontend/src/components/proposal/Success: Celebration screen showing hearts animation, romantic messages, and acceptance record details pulled from the backend.
frontend/src/components/proposal/YesOnly: Interactive proposal component where the No button evades the user while Yes triggers a backend acceptance record and state change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAcceptance.ts: React Query hooks for recording acceptance and retrieving latest acceptance data and counts from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers. Includes helper logic for creating AuthClient instances and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a large set of OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering. Imports global styles and mounts the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended animations, fonts, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata describing a pink Valentine proposal website, its features, requirements, image assets, and overall build state.
